content.text: Psalm 29
A psalm of David.
Ascribe to the , you heavenly beings,
ascribe to the  glory and strength.
Ascribe to the  the glory due his name;
worship the  in the splendor of his holiness.
The voice of the  is over the waters;
the God of glory thunders,
the  thunders over the mighty waters.
The voice of the  is powerful;
the voice of the  is majestic.
The voice of the  breaks the cedars;
the  breaks in pieces the cedars of Lebanon.
He makes Lebanon leap like a calf,
Sirion like a young wild ox.
The voice of the  strikes
with flashes of lightning.
The voice of the  shakes the desert;
the  shakes the Desert of Kadesh.
The voice of the  twists the oaks
and strips the forests bare.
And in his temple all cry, “Glory!”
The  sits enthroned over the flood;
the  is enthroned as King forever.
The  gives strength to his people;
the  blesses his people with peace.
